Pseudo

Pseudo: Not genuine; sham. That’s exactly what the life of Nick Cruz is. A lie. His life has been manipulated by the man who abducted him. 16 years ago. Taken away from the warm embrace of his mother’s arms. Left vulnerable. One life changing event leads him to unravelling the truth. Will it all be what it seems? Will his life, ever be the same again?
